Messages.Author: Aray Karjauv
Messages.Content: One slot is available for "Topic 4: Survey: Explainable AI for Vision Transformers". Interested candidates are urged to contact me at Aray.Karjauv@gt-arc.com Please reach out as soon as possible to secure the spot.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: User study | Visual Counterfactual Explanations | group 8

Messages.Author: Cederic Aßmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, we (group 8) are conducting the study on the explainability of artificial intelligence. In detail, it is about exploring the human perspective on a problem in the classification of facial features. We explore further how human and Generative AI generated Counterfactual Explanations differ. The duration is 8-10 minutes. We are happy if you take your time and participate. The study is to be carried out on a laptop or PC, not a mobile device. Link to the study:  http://visualcounterfactualsstudy.info  Many thanks and best regards! Group 8

Messages.Author: Alina Ustymenko
Messages.Content: Dear DAI Labor team,  I've noticed that some students have been assigned to groups. Will we be receiving an email or some form of notification? I am still uncertain whether I have been rejected or not.  Kind regards, Alina

Messages.Author: Tolga Akar
Messages.Content: Hello Alina,  Unfortunately not being in a group means that you were not selected. Sorry for the confusion.

Messages.Author: Tarik Abu Mukh
Messages.Content: Hello, Due to circumstances i was late to apply to this project, is there still spots for it? If so, is there someone to email about a late registration?  Regards Tarik

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Inquiry about online availability of the course

Messages.Author: Raiyan Mahmud Tanim
Messages.Content: Dear Professor, I am a first-semester student of the program Msc Information Systems Management. Can this course be taken online? Due to the visa issues, I won't be able to attend in-person lectures until June. So if lectures can be taken online up until June, I will continue the course. Or else I'll need to unenroll. Can you confirm if the course can be attended remotely? Thank you.

Messages.Author: David Schultz
Messages.Content: Most of the course can be done online. In-presence meetings are arranged individually for each group.  Please attend the introduction today. The class size is limited. An Application Form will be available today after the introduction.
